ModMetaData.name: Rim-Reanimated
ModMetaData.author: Adakos/FrankLloydWrong
ModMetaData.description:
Death is merely the beginning of service.
Adds a necromancer's table that allows colonists with medical skill to reanimate corpses into temporary undead colonists. These skeletal servants require no food, rest, or comfort but slowly decay over time.
Features: - Cobble together simple revenants from single corpses - Undead colonists require no food, sleep, or recreation - Reanimated colonists slowly decay over time - Retains the skills of the original corpse(s)
